title: New: GEMS – Pegasus
body:
With their SXSW debut fast approaching, Washington D.

C. duo **Gems** have unveiled their third completed track, in the form of _Pegasus_, premiered via our good friend [Disco Naïveté](http://disconaivete.com/post/43646451942). Continuing in the dreamy Beach House meets Cocteau Twins vein that originally garnered them such a flurry of attention, _Pegasus_ is more intimate and all the more accesible for it. It’s considered, vaguely intoxicating and a hugely promising sign of what the group have in store for the future. The internal dialogue between the Clifford and Lindsay isn’t too disimilar to that found on Coexist, the most recent record from The XX, in the documenting a gradually breaking and fragmented relationship.
